sentences.en: Can you give me two refill of each color for the ballpoint pen?
sentences.cn: 能不能请给这支圆珠笔每种颜色配两根替换笔芯?

sentences.en: Denis might drift in and out to refill glasses.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯进进出出,把喝完的酒杯再倒上酒.

sentences.en: Drink up, then I'll refill your glass.
sentences.cn: 喝光, 然后我再给你斟满.

sentences.en: He picked up his glass and emptied it, and the footman came forward to refill it.
sentences.cn: 他拿起酒杯,一饮而尽后侍从又为他斟满.

sentences.en: Knock the ash out of your pipe before you refill it.
sentences.cn: 把烟灰磕出来再装烟丝.

sentences.en: Max held out his cup for a refill.
sentences.cn: 马克斯递过杯子来要再续一杯。

sentences.en: Mechanical Pencil, Refill Leads , Ballpen Wooden Pencil, Eraser, Stationery PlasticPlastic Products.
sentences.cn: 采购产品笔, 充值线索,圆珠笔木制铅笔, 橡皮擦, 文具.

sentences.en: Refill and clean all salt and peppers, sugar bowls, and other condiments.
sentences.cn: 清洁并续满所有的胡椒瓶、盐瓶 、 糖缸及其他调料.

sentences.en: Refill packs are cheaper and lighter.
Remove seal from refill pack or cut along dotted edge on side.
sentences.cn: 去掉料袋的密封或沿侧面点点儿的边缘切开.

sentences.en: She reached over with her chopsticks to refill my bowl.
sentences.cn: 她伸过筷子来给我夹菜.

sentences.en: The bottle must be rinsed out before you refill it.
sentences.cn: 这个瓶子在重新装东西之前必须先冲洗干净.

sentences.en: The figures also affirm something we know every time we refill our gasoline tank.
sentences.cn: 每当我们在油箱里加油时,这些数字也会印证我们的一些认识.

sentences.en: The hikers halted at the stream to refill their flasks.
sentences.cn: 旅行者们在小溪旁停下来往水瓶里补充水.

sentences.en: The waitress refilled our coffee cups.
sentences.cn: 女服务员又把我们的咖啡杯斟满。

sentences.en: Well, I think it's time to refill our glasses.
sentences.cn: 布什:嗯, 我想我们应该再去倒一杯.

trans.tran_cn: 再注满，重新装满，再填，再补充
